com.force.sdk.oauth
Class BaseMockedPartnerConnectionTest

java.lang.Object
  com.force.sdk.oauth.BaseOAuthTest
      com.force.sdk.oauth.BaseMockedPartnerConnectionTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuthFilterCookieManagementTest, AuthFilterSessionManagementTest, BasicForceOAuthConnectorTest, ForceUserDataRetrieverTest, SecurityContextCookieStoreTest
public class BaseMockedPartnerConnectionTest
extends BaseOAuthTest

This is the base class to be used for security tests that need to mock the partner API connection.

Nested Class Summary
protected static class BaseMockedPartnerConnectionTest.MockConnector
          These mock classes allow us to simulate the calls to the partner api without actually making them.
